name: Tumbleweed Trouble
description:
Tumbleweed Trouble is a small game made for a 48 hour long 1-bit themed game jam. The secondary theme was "One button" and so to play you only have to click 1 button - the left mouse button.

Watch out for dangerous tumbleweed rolling your way. To fend of any tumbleweed you can shoot it with your trusty ol' revolver, but watch out not to launch yourself into cacti!

Side note: There is a bug where the ammo UI is just a black square when the game is played in the browser for some reason, so until I fix it just pretend you can see it :D
